subject: Your payment is ready!
body:
Dear Esteemed Customer,

Your payment $12.9 Million is here; presented by one Dr. Atiku Usman. I am notify you that we shall redirect our site within 2 working days for security of our customers.

Therefore, you are requested to forward the following information below to update your account and login details to retain your funds as well.

1. Your full name.
2. Copy of your identification and photo head shot.
3. Your Cell phone number.
4. Occupation.

Once you reconfirm the above info, I will have your account updated and send you the login details. Your failure to have your account updated shall result to lock off your account, and it may take many processes to retrieve.

I am expecting the above info as soon as possible.

Yours sincerely,

Ms. Clementina Parks.
Customer Care Service.

===Texas Capital Bank===
